channel.title: Elenthium 719 | 24/7 Vps hosted | New Server | Friendly Community | High Detail
channel.description:
[IMG]http://elenthium.netau.net/forum/public/style_images/9_6_29bdeg2.jpg[/img]
[B][U]Links[/U][/B] [url=http://elenthium.co.uk/forum.php]Forums[/url] [url=http://uppit.com/sj5aypao1an4/elenthium.jar]Desktop Client[/url]
[B][U]Why should you join Elenthium?[/U][/B] No lag. Dedicated server with 1 Gbps internet connection. Very stable server. Daily Updates. Decent drop rates. Double Drop Weekends. Friendly Staff Team Friendly Community Donator zone for the awesome donators Owner listens to your suggestions Auto Donate, get your purchase instantly Auto Vote, get vote points or squeal of fortune spins instantly
[B][U]Features:[/U][/B] Great Skilling system Lootshare Auto Vote System Auto Donate System Vote4spins Vote4points Pyramid Plunder Dominion Tower Gilded Altar Castle Wars Squeal of Fortune Money Pouch (Shop and trade Support) Clan Wars Safe and Risk portal for fun fights. Duel Arena with Staking. Recipe for Disaster Boss fight (Instanced map just like Runescape) Glacors with fire spell weakness. Fairy Ring (Code for Glacors is DKQ) Forinthry Dungeon for pvp items. Loyalty Shop Bork Kuradal's Dungeon Fight Caves/Fight Kiln Queen Black Dragon King Black Dragon Barrows Jadinko Lair Frost Dragons Slayer Tower with all floors (including slayer task system) Polypore Dungeon Corporeal Beast Frost Dragons Perfected Combat system Bonecrusher (Dungeoneering) Kalphite Queen Barrows Chaotics Ancient Spells Ancient Curses Tormented Demons Godwars (Zaros/Nex, Bandos, Armadyl, Zamorak, Saradomin)
[B]Note:[/B] Adding pictures at the moment
[U][B]Pictures[/B][/U] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2lkxsw0.png[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/5mflno.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/fmi1bs.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i49.tinypic.com/29eoroh.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i45.tinypic.com/2rd94d2.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/15p02g6.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/2dmed5i.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/16lw9d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i50.tinypic.com/28lrzax.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/2d0f9tg.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i47.tinypic.com/33pgh9d.jpg[/img] [IMG]http://i46.tinypic.com/iyh0df.jpg[/img]

Desktop Client

Why should you join Elenthium?
No lag.
Dedicated server with 1 Gbps internet connection.
Very stable server.
Daily Updates.
Decent drop rates.
Double Drop Weekends.
Friendly Staff Team
Friendly Community
Donator zone for the awesome donators
Owner listens to your suggestions
Auto Donate, get your purchase instantly
Auto Vote, get vote points or squeal of fortune spins instantly
